text.noop: The development of the AWK site script has been stalled. There will be no further development on this project. This project always was a proof of concept only. Bugs are not gonna be fixed. For current programming projects please visit

content.text: Awksite is a small but usefull CGI application for generating dynamic HTML sites. It runs on all systems having GNU AWK (most *NIX boxes) installed.
Look through the template and config file and you will understand very quickly how to use this small CGI script.
